author: China Uncensored
description:
A love affair involving one of China's leading doctors ignited a scandal that is engulfing all of Chinese society.

Doctor Xiao Fei was a surgeon at the highly-regarded China-Japan Friendship Hospital in Beijing and a rising star in the Chinese medical community. But after his serial infidelity with doctors Dong Xiying and Shi Yuhui, a head nurse in his department at the China-Japan Friendship Hospital, was exposed, it highlights a lot of what Chinese people are fed up with about Chinese society today.

title: A Crazy Doctor Set China on Fire
